Articles.Content: I have been playing Ksp on my PlayStation 4 for a while now, but I have realized the increased capabilities of the PC/Steam version. Is there anyway I can recover my purchase so I don't have to spend another $70 to get Ksp on my PC?

No, but the game is frequently on sale. https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/190032-ksp-sale-thread/page/2/

In fact, it is now, at -75%, so it's your best chance to buy.
